content: this hooded cowl crochet pattern combines textured stitches and stripes to make a cozy winter accessory this pattern was the eighth weekend mystery crochet along with underground crafter 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet single_crochet treble triple crochet crocheting flat in row changing colors seaming with the mattress stitch includes video tutorials special stitch pattern fpsc includes written instructions and video tutorial **skill level** easy **finished size** teen/adult 29 73 5 cm circumference x 15 5 39 5 cm height **materials** lion brand heartland yarn 100% acrylic 5 oz/142 g 251 yd/230 m 1 skein each in 149r great smoky mountains ca 150t mount rainier cb and 171m cuyahoga valley cc *or approximately 251 yd 230 m each in ca and cb and 70 yd 64 m in cc in any medium weight yarn * us size j-10/6mm mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge * yarn needle **gauge** 13 double_crochet = 4 10 cm *exact gauge is not critical for this project * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2022/01/28/weekend-mystery-crochet-alongs/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/02/01/norma-easy-hooded-cowl-crochet-pattern/
